speaker: President.
english: President. I understand the concerns that you are raising, but I have to say that I am unaware of anything in the Rules of Procedure that would help us resolve this problem.
original: President. I understand the concerns that you are raising, but I have to say that I am unaware of anything in the Rules of Procedure that would help us resolve this problem.
agenda_item: Results of the informal Council of foreign ministers (10-11 March 2006) (debate)
